info.task: navigate to next row in grid
info.title: Navigate to the next row in a grid

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first cell of the second row in the grid

user: Navigate to the next row in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the next row in the grid.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('02-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 3) are conveyed
